name: Aanya Patel
short: Inspires young girls to pursue space tech and coding.
full: Aanya Patel has mentored over 200 girls in rural India through STEM workshops focused on robotics and satellite engineering.

name: Luna Garcia
short: Passionate about propulsion systems and rocketry.
full: Luna leads a nanosatellite design team at her university and promotes eco-friendly rocket propulsion technologies.

name: Sarah Ahmed
short: Researches exoplanets and deep-space imaging.
full: Sarah studies planetary atmospheres and helps young women enter astrophysics through mentorship programs.

name: Mei Tan
short: Designs autonomous systems for satellite repair.
full: Mei focuses on robotic arms for orbit servicing missions and hosts regional STEM workshops for girls.

name: Zara Khan
short: Studies chemical compositions of interstellar dust.
full: Zara researches cosmic organic molecules that shape planetary formation, inspiring students across South Asia.

name: Elena Rossi
short: Leads educational space initiatives across Europe.
full: Elena develops learning programs connecting students with the European Space Agency’s missions.

name: Amara Johnson
short: Explores microbial life in extreme environments.
full: Amara’s research in astrobiology inspires young minds to think beyond Earth’s boundaries.

name: Keiko Nakamura
short: Specializes in CubeSat design and telemetry systems.
full: Keiko leads university satellite projects and advocates for more women in aerospace engineering.

name: Fatima Suleiman
short: Focuses on propulsion and reusable launch systems.
full: Fatima’s innovations in propulsion efficiency are shaping Nigeria’s growing space program.

name: Maria Oliveira
short: Studies Martian terrain and habitability.
full: Maria collaborates with international agencies to research Mars’ geology and life potential.

name: Claire Dubois
short: Teaches stellar evolution and space science.
full: Claire has inspired thousands through her public astronomy lectures and youth outreach.

name: Ingrid Larsen
short: Develops models for satellite trajectory optimization.
full: Ingrid’s mathematical expertise improves fuel efficiency for small satellite missions.

name: Rina Das
short: Builds AI tools for space mission control systems.
full: Rina’s code powers real-time telemetry analysis for satellites and space simulations.

name: Sofia Martinez
short: Advocates for ethical and inclusive space exploration.
full: Sofia advises European governments on diversity and sustainability in aerospace development.

name: Hannah Park
short: Processes satellite data for climate monitoring.
full: Hannah’s work with Earth observation datasets contributes to global environmental awareness.

name: Nadia Petrova
short: Specializes in neutron stars and cosmic radiation.
full: Nadia mentors female physics students and collaborates with global observatories.

name: Chloe Brown
short: Monitors and coordinates satellite flight operations.
full: Chloe ensures mission safety at the European Space Operations Centre.

name: Thandiwe Moyo
short: Brings space science to underprivileged schools.
full: Thandiwe founded a space education NGO reaching thousands of African students.

name: Leila Haddad
short: Works on satellite launch vehicle design.
full: Leila’s innovative work in aerodynamics strengthens North Africa’s aerospace community.

name: Emily Carter
short: Designs components for small-satellite missions.
full: Emily’s precision engineering ensures successful satellite assembly and deployment.

name: Ruqayyah Al Mansoori
short: Explores Mars and lunar mission technologies.
full: Ruqayyah contributes to the Emirates Mars Mission and promotes STEM education for girls.

name: Adaeze Okafor
short: Leads student-built satellite initiatives.
full: Adaeze’s leadership inspires African youth to innovate in space science.

name: Kiana Lee
short: Focuses on nanosatellite integration and testing.
full: Kiana develops payload systems for educational CubeSat projects in Southeast Asia.

name: Anika Bose
short: Applies AI to satellite image recognition.
full: Anika’s AI algorithms help predict weather and detect deforestation using orbital data.

name: Isabella Cruz
short: Combines astronomy and data science for discovery.
full: Isabella’s algorithms assist observatories in mapping star systems.

name: Mina Osei
short: Develops national space education strategies.
full: Mina represents Africa in global discussions about ethical space exploration.

name: Nora Jensen
short: Studies Earth’s upper atmosphere using satellite data.
full: Nora’s climate analysis projects raise awareness about environmental sustainability.

name: Diana Popescu
short: Develops rover navigation algorithms.
full: Diana’s software enables autonomous Mars rover decision-making.

name: Layla Farouk
short: Teaches cosmic evolution and interstellar physics.
full: Layla inspires her students to pursue research in dark matter and cosmology.

name: Ava Thompson
short: Prepares for suborbital flight missions.
full: Ava is part of a global astronaut program promoting women in spaceflight.

name: Riley Moore
short: Programs spacecraft control systems.
full: Riley develops critical flight software for Australian nanosatellite missions.

name: Ivy Zhang
short: Studies ultra-lightweight composites for rockets.
full: Ivy’s research advances reusable rocket technologies across Asia.

name: Tasha Mbatha
short: Works on optical telescope calibration.
full: Tasha is building Kenya’s first student-run observatory for deep-space studies.

name: Julia Novak
short: Researches dark energy and the early universe.
full: Julia is part of international teams exploring cosmic microwave background radiation.

name: Olivia Hughes
short: Designs antenna systems for satellites.
full: Olivia works on signal optimization for interplanetary communication networks.

name: Emma Lopez
short: Studies binary star systems and their dynamics.
full: Emma collaborates with global observatories to analyze celestial patterns.

name: Priya Menon
short: Explores quantum algorithms for space simulations.
full: Priya integrates physics and computation for next-gen space mission models.

name: Nadia Torres
short: Focuses on sustainable space mission design.
full: Nadia promotes eco-conscious satellite development across Latin America.

name: Amira Said
short: Develops clean fuel alternatives for rockets.
full: Amira leads experiments optimizing green propellants for orbital missions.

name: Selene Costa
short: Analyzes lunar and Martian surface samples.
full: Selene’s work enhances our understanding of extraterrestrial mineralogy.

name: Aria Chen
short: Designs high-resolution imaging sensors for telescopes.
full: Aria’s optical systems help capture deep-space imagery from orbit.

name: Tara O'Neill
short: Lectures on stellar formation and galactic dynamics.
full: Tara’s research delves into young star clusters and nebulae.

name: Sasha Ivanova
short: Assembles small-satellite propulsion systems.
full: Sasha’s hands-on expertise brings precision manufacturing to aerospace labs.

name: Kiara Ali
short: Organizes youth STEM events across the Middle East.
full: Kiara’s outreach bridges innovation and education for thousands of students.

name: Lina Svensson
short: Processes cosmic ray data for research teams.
full: Lina develops cloud systems for international astrophysics collaborations.

name: Freya Müller
short: Captures breathtaking images of deep space.
full: Freya’s award-winning space photography inspires millions online.

name: Ayaka Mori
short: Studies astronaut health in microgravity.
full: Ayaka’s research supports future long-duration space missions.

name: Bella Russo
short: Develops radiation-resistant spacecraft materials.
full: Bella’s nanomaterials protect satellites from extreme space environments.

name: Jasmine Clark
short: Designs AI navigation for space rovers.
full: Jasmine builds intelligent pathfinding systems for extraterrestrial robotics.

name: Helena Petrović
short: Advocates for responsible space resource use.
full: Helena shapes global policies for ethical space exploration.

name: Mila Nguyen
short: Tracks and models orbital debris fields.
full: Mila’s work ensures safer satellite trajectories in low Earth orbit.

name: Saanvi Reddy
short: Builds AI models for astronomy data interpretation.
full: Saanvi develops neural networks to detect celestial patterns from telescope images.

name: Yara Mahmoud
short: Runs space outreach programs for students.
full: Yara organizes community stargazing and science literacy initiatives.

name: Noor Hassan
short: Researches galaxy clusters and cosmic structure.
full: Noor promotes women’s participation in astronomy research across the Arab world.

name: Grace Walker
short: Designs simulations for deep-space missions.
full: Grace’s models assist NASA projects in optimizing spacecraft control algorithms.

name: Elif Kaya
short: Tests reusable rocket systems.
full: Elif leads performance optimization studies for national space programs.

name: Carolina Vega
short: Researches cosmic dust in star-forming regions.
full: Carolina collaborates with ALMA to map interstellar dust structures.
